content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <rdf:RDF xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:syn="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/modules/syndication/" xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/">             <channel rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/search_rss">   <title>Environmental Information Data Centre</title>   <link>http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk</link>    <description>                  These are the search results for the query, showing results 1 to 1.            </description>            <image rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/logo.png"/>    <items>     <rdf:Seq>                <rdf:li rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/aa82fa99-d38c-47a7-9405-f0773edcd7a8"/>            </rdf:Seq>   </items>  </channel>     <item rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/aa82fa99-d38c-47a7-9405-f0773edcd7a8">     <title>Water chemistry data for the River Frome, Dorset, UK, from 1965-2009</title>     <link>http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/aa82fa99-d38c-47a7-9405-f0773edcd7a8</link>     <description>Weekly water quality monitoring of the River Frome at East Stoke, Dorset (National Grid Reference SY 867868).  The dataset consists of  nitrate, soluble reactive phosphorus, dissolved silicon, pH, alkalinity, potassium, sodium, calcium and magnesium concentrations for the entire 44-year monitoring period, with total phosphorus, total dissolved phosphorus, electrical conductivity, water temperature, chloride, sulphate and ammonium concentration data for periods within the monitoring period.  Daily average river flow on the day of sampling (extracted from the National River Flow Archive) is included.  Users of these data must ensure that the conditions of the licence agreement are complied with and the 'Principal Citation Reference' element of this metadata record is cited in full.  (c) Database Right/Copyright NERC - Centre for Ecology & Hydrology and FBA (Freshwater Biological Association). All rights reserved.  </description>          <dc:publisher>No publisher</dc:publisher>     <dc:creator>Cynthia Davies</dc:creator>     <dc:rights></dc:rights>            <dc:subject>CEH Water Programme</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>Frome</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>Dorset</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>Southern England</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>Long-term</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>CEH Project C00010</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>NERC_DDC</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>Chemistry</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>Inland water</dc:subject>                 <dc:subject>Environmental monitoring facilities</dc:subject>          <dc:date>2012-08-07T13:35:35Z</dc:date>     <dc:type>EIDC Document Container</dc:type>   </item>     </rdf:RDF>
